sentences.en: As a plastic art prints, refers to the creation of printmaking.
sentences.cn: 作为造型艺术的版画, 是指创作版画.

sentences.en: Because of the difference of material and technology, different kinds of printmaking have different art appreciation.
sentences.cn: 由于版材和技术手段的不同的版种具有不同的美感.

sentences.en: Drawing and printmaking, in particular, often are described as graphic arts.
sentences.cn: 绘画及版画, 尤其是常常被形容为印艺.

sentences.en: Fine art courses including oil painting, printmaking, drawing, gouache , water colour and children's painting.
sentences.cn: 美术方面教授油画 、 版画 、 素描、水彩 、 水粉、儿童画及美术基础课程.

sentences.en: Instead of relegating himself to one media, Tuominen employs photography, printmaking, and painting, often mixing the techniques together to conjure the impression of memory.
sentences.cn: 托米能不仅仅局限于一种媒介而是涉及了摄影，版画和绘画，通常混合各种手法来召唤记忆的印象。

sentences.en: Printmaking is the process of making artworks by printing, normally on paper.
sentences.cn: 版画是制作过程艺术品印刷, 通常是纸上谈兵.

sentences.en: Relief printing is the oldest form of printmaking.
sentences.cn: 凸版印刷是最古老的版画制作形式.

sentences.en: The modern version of the artist to explore a variety of forms, sometimes in a print, according to the content needs and mix various types of printmaking methods, such as integrated graphics prints.
sentences.cn: 现代的版画家为了探索多种多样的表现形式，有时在一幅版画内，按内容需要，同时混用各种类型的版画方法，这种版画称作综合版画。

sentences.en: The relationship of printmaking skill and feeling expression be paid more and more attention.
sentences.cn: 版画技法与情感表达的关系问题已愈来愈引起人们的关注.

sentences.en: The work in the exhibitions includes sculpture, printmaking, painting, video art and drawing.
sentences.cn: 本次展览包涵雕塑 、 版画 、 油画 、 视频及素描等艺术门类.

sentences.en: Those visual arts linearcharacter , such as drawing and engraving, esp. those that involve printing and printmaking.
sentences.cn: 平面视角艺术,特别是指与印刷业有关的素描 、 雕刻等.

trans.tran_en: Printmaking is an artistic technique that consists of making a series of pictures from an original, or from a specially prepared surface
